<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ceremony of the Evened Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=2777) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conrasu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=343" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have cultivated your exoskeleton's form for close combat, using knots, whorls, and reinforced branches. When you select this feat, you gain a claws [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage and has the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) and [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) traits or a branch unarmed attack that deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage and has the [backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173) trait. Each of these unarmed attacks is in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) weapon group and uses one of your hands.

**Special** You can select this feat twice, choosing the other unarmed attack the second time you take it.

<title level="2">Ceremony of the Evened Hand leads to...</title>
[Ceremony of the Strengthened Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=2786)
name: Ceremony of the Evened Hand
